insert into meta_file ( uuid, file_name, file_path, package_name, module_name, meta_package_uuid, start_commit, start_commit_date, end_commit, end_commit_date, repo_uuid, branch, version ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.fileName}, #{item.filePath}, #{item.parent.packageName}, #{item.parent.moduleName}, #{item.parent.rootUuid}, #{commonInfo.commit}, #{commonInfo.commitDate}, #{commonInfo.commit}, #{commonInfo.commitDate}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid}, #{commonInfo.branch}, #{item.version} )

insert into raw_file ( uuid, file_name, meta_file_uuid, version, commitid, committer, commit_date, commit_message, last_change_commit, change_relation, branch, repo_uuid ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.filePath}, #{item.rootUuid}, #{item.version}, #{commonInfo.commit}, #{commonInfo.committer}, #{commonInfo.commitDate}, #{commonInfo.commitMessage}, #{commonInfo.parentCommit}, #{item.changeStatus}, #{commonInfo.branch}, #{commonInfo.repoUuid} )
mapper.select: select version,uuid from meta_file where file_path = #{path} and repo_uuid = #{repoUuid} and branch = #{branch} order by version desc limit 1
